Util::Key

Util::Key< T > Class Template Reference
[Multithreading]

Thread private attributeThis class provides an interface to posix pthread specific attributes. It only includes operators for :

  • getting specific data key create() with a value destructor function called at the end of the thread
  • setting/getting specific data set() get().

Detailed Description

template<class T>
class Util::Key< T >

Thread private attribute

This class provides an interface to posix pthread specific attributes. It only includes operators for :

  • getting specific data key create() with a value destructor function called at the end of the thread
  • setting/getting specific data set() get().

Get the thread specific value associated with a given key.

Returns:

Associate a thread specific value to a key.

Exceptions:
PosixError if the key is not correct.
